New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists, becoming the first player in NBA history to achieve 20+ points, 15+ rebounds, and 15+ assists in under 30 minutes.
Key Match Events: The Nuggets scored 40 points in the first quarter but were rallies by the Hawks before taking control in the third quarter with a dominant run leading to a 20-point lead.
Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets had a season-high 44 assists and swept the two games of the season series against the Hawks.
Post-Match Reflections: The Nuggets won 139-120, with Nikola Jokic's historic performance and strong contributions from Russell Westbrook, Michael Porter Jr., and Jamal Murray leading the team to victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Trae Young led the Hawks with 30 points and nine assists, but the Nuggets' overall performance was more impactful.
